lines: 1. Sing them over again to me Wonderful words of life; Let me more of their beauty see, Wonderful words of life. Words of life and beauty Teach me faith and duty;
Refrain : Beautiful words, wonderful words, Wonderful words of life, Beautiful words, wonderful words, Wonderful words of life.
2. Christ, the blessed One, gives to all Wonderful words of life; Sinner, list to the loving call, Wonderful words of life. All so freely given, Wooing us to heaven;
3. Sweetly echo the gospel call, Wonderful words of life; Offer pardon and peace to all, Wonderful words of life. Jesus, only Saviour, Sanctify forever;
